seo.title: Home
seo.description: Esplora la tradizione italiana dell'arredamento di qualità con Pacelli Arredamenti. Con oltre 50 anni di esperienza, collaboriamo con oltre 50 brand di eccellenza, offrendo una vasta gamma di prodotti

description.item1: Explore the Italian tradition of quality furniture with Pacelli Arredamenti. With over 50 years of experience, we collaborate with over 50 excellent brands, offering a vast range of products

item7.title:
The furniture
you are looking for
item7.desc: Pacelli Arredamenti is the point of reference where you can find the best selection of kitchens, bedrooms, children's rooms, living rooms, sofas, armchairs, curtains, mattresses and bed bases, lighting, office furniture and decorations.

item1.title: Mission
item1.subtitle: Creating extraordinary environments that transform customer visions into reality, ensuring successful experiences

item2.title: Why us
item2.subtitle: Choosing Pacelli Arredamenti is a unique experience, with quality and convenience that come together to make your furnishing dreams come true

item3.title: Strengths
item3.subtitle: Our success is built on high-quality products, precision and a commitment to trust and transparency

brand.title: Along with the best brands
brand.subtitle1: We are proud to say that the companies we supply are considered the best in the furniture market. Companies oriented towards the search for modern and creative solutions and attentive to changes in home living and furnishings
brand.subtitle2: Quality, innovation, reliability and collaboration are the fundamental principles on which our relationship with these exceptional partners is based

item1.author: Geltrude
item1.excerpt: Happy to have entrusted myself to you who were super professional and managed to meet my taste by very gracefully creating the laboratory I have always dreamed of

item2.author: Maria
item2.excerpt: Paolo is a great professional. He always knows how to advise you with kindness and awareness of his knowledge!

item3.author: Marajà
item3.excerpt: Thank you Paolo for perfectly realizing our idea. Congratulations for your professionalism, kindness and precision. Thank you angora from the whole Marajà family

item4.author: Franco
item4.excerpt: Thanks to Arredamenti Pacelli for the professionalism and competence in the design and assembly of my new kitchen, I received many compliments from my friends

item5.author: Lino
item5.excerpt: Professionalism personified, a beautiful person. I had the pleasure of collaborating with them, passion without end

item6.author: Agostino
item6.excerpt: Thank you for your immense professionalism

item7.author: Claudia
item7.excerpt: They reach everywhere and bring you a piece of home

item8.author: Vincenzo
item8.excerpt: Thank you very much to you Paolo and your staff for your great professionalism and availability, it was a real pleasure for me too to collaborate with you

booking.title: Make an appointment with us
booking.subtitle: Do you want an environment that reflects your personality and meets your needs? Book an appointment with us, and we will be happy to help you in the initial evaluation of your spaces to be furnished. Our team of experts will assist you in designing the best solution for you. Let's make your home decor dreams a reality. Contact us today!
